head.title: About Acueducto
head.description: Get to know us better. Read about us.

intro.title: as experts in the digital context
intro.p:
Without us realizing, we started this studio 15 years ago growing together and sharing design and personal & professional projects.

Motivated by innovation and high quality standards, we joined our professional paths in order to create thoughtful and powerful digital experiences.

Acueducto is not just a studio, it is the result of a journey that has taken many years to build, as our own friendship has.

team.name:
rodrigo
salmerón
team.bio:
An interaction, visual, and motion designer and an open-source-enthusiast developer with an Interaction Design MA from The Harbour Space University and 10 years of experience as a freelancer.

He has also worked for several design firms, film production houses, and development companies.

Rodrigo is also a music producer, composer, and lyricist; and whether it’s about music, coding or human-machine interactions, he’s always trying out the latest tools while looking for new challenges.

team.name:
artemio
pedraza
team.bio:
A communication strategist, project and community manager with six years of experience as a freelancer.

He has gone from copywriter to content manager, and marketing consultant and is one of the first licensed digital communicators in Mexico.

When he’s not directing the strategy department or managing a project at Acueducto, he runs his own digital record label Bludot.

intro.title: what makes</br>us unique
intro.p: Years of experience have shaped the core values of Acueducto. Governed by the following principles, we aim to become better impact-driven business strategists and quality-driven digital experience developers.

beliefs.title: We get involved
beliefs.p: Trust us, long lasting relationships get the best results.

beliefs.title: We love challenges
beliefs.p: And amazing work can happen if we analyze them together.

beliefs.title: We are quality driven
beliefs.p: If our work is not incredible, why bother doing it?

beliefs.title: We are human
beliefs.p: We put people first, working respecfully with respectful clients.

beliefs.title: We work for your users
beliefs.p: There may be times we will have to side with them.

beliefs.title: We are tech romantics
beliefs.p: Future solutions for today's problems, expect the bleeding edge.

beliefs.title: We are fair
beliefs.p: We rate our work on the added value we bring to your business.

beliefs.title: We keep learning
beliefs.p: We embrace change, a lot of times it’s part of the solution.

beliefs.title: We are always open
beliefs.p: We love feedback, hearing what you have to say is a fundamental part of our process.

cases.title:
our selected
case studies
cases.p:
Every project we develop is unique, so we hand-picked these case studies to provide an understanding of how Acueducto works and what it can achieve.

Read about the selected projects we have launched alongside our partners.

process.title:
is placing strategy
at the core
process.p:
Innovation happens not by a spontaneous spark of creativity, but through a process that looks for real pain points and the best way to solve them.

Approaching challenges through Strategic Design means working, alongside our partners, from the inception of the project, to develop strategies that deliver the best results for them and their users.

Discover our process.

steps.title: discover
steps.p:
Understand the context, audience, needs, and challenges of the project.
We get smart.

steps.title: envision
steps.p:
Here we re-frame the problem to highlight new insights and opportunities.
We make sense.

steps.title: build the story
steps.p:
Create a strategy that guides concepting, prioritization, and co-creation.
We create empathy.

steps.title: design, tech & craft
steps.p:
Create prototypes, copywrite, iterate and refine designs, code, and test the product.
We develop.

steps.title: launch
steps.p:
Implement new solutions, support socialization of organizational changes and product innovation.
We drive change.

steps.title: review
steps.p:
Reflect, document, and iterate on our process and approach.
We get better.

values.title:
to build better
communities
values.p:
To the benefit of both final users and stakeholders, we are always looking for ways to make a positive impact through our work.

That’s why we founded Acueducto, to ask the hard questions, test the ground on which we stand, and help brands and businesses enhance their surroundings and empower their users.
